dialogue.text: That gun ain't gonna shoot itself girl.
AH- oh um... Yeah no, I've been ready... yeah for sure- I've done this before.. ahah.. phew.
Don't lie to me... I know you're pooping yourself right now.
Okay... dang it. I might be a tiny bit nervous. It's just; I get this really good opportunity to make a movie with these rich demon people...
I'm here, I'm not sure why I'm practicing but it's actually happening. I can't believe it. W-w what if my movie flops?
W-what if people hate it? I feel like my head is going to explode, man!
I know, Chloe. If I'm gonna be honest with you, you're not the only one whose pants are a little heavy right now. Trust me, I'ma bit nervous myself.
You don't look like it..You're pretty and hold yourself up and I bet you're saying that to make me feel better. How do you manage?
Trust me, I'm not all that. How do I manage? I don't... I just try to do my best. And that's all we could ever do.
Look how about this; do you wanna rehearse together after this? We don't start filming until a few hours. Maybe it'll help both of us calm our nerves, y'know?
I mean, yes! I would love to! Only if you don't mind! I don't wanna mess up and panic or anything.
Oh shut up! You're gonna do great girl, come on. Let's walk.
Chloe, I need you to chillax. No one is gonna be a star on the first try. Expect to mess up, but do your best!
I know when I first started, mostly everyone made fun of me. But I kept going! And- Chloe sweetie, hand up here.
S-sorry ma'am. However, yes, you're absolutely right. I guess I just have to give it all I got... screw it.
